question: What I know is during Periods whatever a girl wear needs to be wash/purify. Is it true?.
answer:
QUESTION
Further do a person needs to purify/wash those heavy and delicate clothes as well which a person wears while attending a party? or if a person take good care they may not need a wash, because those clothes are not easily washable and have a high chance that they got damaged during wash. Thanks
ANSWER


Share:
Clothes worn during periods as well as during parties do not become impure if they are not soiled with any impurity.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
FATWA DEPT.
